Questionnairehttps://voicecollab.ai/fhir/Questionnaire/dneuroalzheimersdiseasemildcognitiveimpairmeschema#0.1.0
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_gsd_clinical_history1. Gold Standard Diagnosis Does the patient have Major Neurocognitive Disorder - Alzheimer's Type, Mild Cognitive Impairment or other types of dementia confirmed by going through (must fill at least one):: Clinical history:0..1string
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_gsd_functional_inventoryFunctional Inventory:0..1string
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_gsd_cognitive_testingCognitive Testing:0..1string
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_gsd_other_investigationsOther investigations:0..1string
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_causesHave you excluded other causes of cognitive/functional changes (and/or other subtypes)?0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_dt2. Disease Type: Specify the disease type in the patient:0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_dt_otherIf you selected "other", please specify:0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_dt = other
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_etiology3. Etiology: What is the suspected or known etiology in the patient?0..1string
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_etiology_gfGenetic Factors Subcategory0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_etiology = 1
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_etiology_gf_otherIf you selected "Other genetic factors", please specify:0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_etiology_gf = 1
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_etiology_other_medical_conditionsIf you selected "other medical conditions", please specify:0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_etiology = 1
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_etiology_otherIf you selected "other", please specify:0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_etiology = 1
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_ds4. Disease Severity: What is the current stage/severity of cognitive impairment or dementia in the patient?0..1string
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_ds_cdrClinical dementia rating (CDR) staging subcategory:0..1choiceEnable When: diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_ds = 1
Options: 4 options
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_ca_rudas_score5. Cognitive Assessment (must fill at least one): Rowland Universal Dementia Assessment Scale (RUDAS) score:0..1string
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_ca_mmse_scoreMini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) score:0..1string
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_ca_moca_scoreMontreal Cognitive Assessment (MoCA) score:0..1string
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_ca_adas_cog_scoreAlzheimer's Disease Assessment Scale-Cognitive Subscale (ADAS-Cog) score:0..1string
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_ca_otherOther cognitive assessment tool (Please Specify):0..1string
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_ca_other_scoreOther cognitive assessment tool score:0..1string
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained6. Treatment Obtained: Has the patient undergone any treatment for Alzheimer's disease or cognitive impairment or other types of dementia?0..1choiceOptions: 2 options
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained_yesYes0..1stringEnable When: diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained = yes
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained_yes_medicationsMedications:0..1stringEnable When:
  • diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained = yes
  • diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained_yes = 1
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained_yes_medications_otherIf you selected "Other", please specify:0..1string
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained_yes_npiNon-pharmacological interventions:0..1stringEnable When:
  • diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained = yes
  • diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained_yes = 1
diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained_yes_npi_otherIf you selected "Other", please specify:0..1stringEnable When:
  • diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained = yes
  • diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained_yes = 1
  • diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained_yes_npi = 1

Documentation for this format

Option Sets

Answer options for diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_causes

  • No
  • Yes
  • Not certain

Answer options for diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_dt

  • Mild Cognitive Impairment (MCI)
  • Typical Alzheimer's Disease (AD)
  • Frontotemporal Dementia (FTD)
  • Lewy Body Dementia (LBD)
  • Vascular Dementia (VaD)
  • Mixed Dementia (e.g.
  • Other

Answer options for diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_ds_cdr

  • CDR 0.5 (Very mild impairment)
  • CDR 1 (Mild impairment)
  • CDR 2 (Moderate impairment)
  • CDR 3 (Severe impairment)

Answer options for diagnosis_alz_dementia_mci_treatment_obtained

  • Yes
  • No

item.text:
1. Gold Standard Diagnosis
Does the patient have Major Neurocognitive Disorder - Alzheimer's Type, Mild Cognitive Impairment or other types of dementia confirmed by going through
(must fill at least one):: Clinical history:
Have you excluded other causes of cognitive/functional changes (and/or other subtypes)?
2. Disease Type: Specify the disease type in the patient:
3. Etiology: What is the suspected or known etiology in the patient?
If you selected "Other genetic factors", please specify:
If you selected "other medical conditions", please specify:
4. Disease Severity: What is the current stage/severity of cognitive impairment or dementia in the patient?

5. Cognitive Assessment
(must fill at least one): Rowland Universal Dementia Assessment Scale (RUDAS) score:
Alzheimer's Disease Assessment Scale-Cognitive Subscale (ADAS-Cog) score:
6. Treatment Obtained: Has the patient undergone any treatment for Alzheimer's disease or cognitive impairment or other types of dementia?
